body: Putting on or taking off armor is a sometimes complicated procedure. The time required to don armor depends on its type; see the table below.
name: Getting Into and Out of Armor
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Armor/Getting Into and Out of Armor

sections.body: This column tells how long it takes a character to put the armor on. (One minute is 10 rounds.) Readying (strapping on) a shield is only a move action.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Armor/Getting Into and Out of Armor/Don
sections.name: Don

sections.body: This column tells how long it takes to put the armor on in a hurry. The armor check penalty and armor bonus for hastily donned armor are each 1 point worse than normal.
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Armor/Getting Into and Out of Armor/Don Hastily
sections.name: Don Hastily

sections.body: This column tells how long it takes to get the armor off. Removing a shield from your arm and dropping it is only a move action.
sections.name: Remove
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Arms And Armor/Armor/Getting Into and Out of Armor/Remove
